cwe.Description: This entry has been deprecated because it was a duplicate of CWE-908. All content has been transferred to CWE-908.

xhtml:p: Use for Mapping: Prohibited (this CWE ID must not be used to map to real-world vulnerabilities).

Comments: see description for suggestions of other CWEs to consider.
